name: Couples in Love - Dress up
description:
This dress up is 3 important periods of girl's life. First - to be in love, second - wedding preparation, third - to be recognized by society. So dress up these 3 amazing couples. 3 in 1 game here.
1. Couple in love
Look this couple, they are in love, they enjoy of being together, nothing disturbs the, so why don't you help them with dress up. Anyway they are busy with each other so they will be happy if somebody will think about their look.
2. Wedding preparation
Next couple is about wedding preparation. The very special moment in the life of each girl. The dress up for this event is the main key to pay attention, and don't forget about broom. Just amazing this opportunity in real life, to be able to choose husband like it the store :)
3. Red carpet
This couple does not need any representation, they are lucky, successful, knows what they want and enjoy their life. Dress up is important part of their life, millions of eyes watch them daily, so this got to be perfect.
